definition.de: Bahnrundenrennen, bei der zwei Mannschaften aus der Mitte aus nach unten gegenüber Geraden setzen und versuchen, die Lücke zwischen ihnen zu verringern
definition.dk: Konkurrenterne starter på den modsatte side af den runde bane. Hvis nogen den ene  modstanderen, er løbet forbi, ellers vinder den bedste tid.
definition.en-GB: Track cycle event where two teams set off from midway down opposite straights and try to make up the gap between them
definition.en-US: Track cycle event where two teams set off from midway down opposite straights and try to make up the gap between them
definition.pt-BR: Duas equipes partem de pontos médios opostos de uma pista e tentam recuperar a distância entre elas.
definition.pt-PT: Duas equipas partem de pontos médios opostos de uma pista e tentam recuperar a distância entre elas.
definition.se: Tävlande lag startar på motsatt sida av rundbanan. Om något lag hinner ikapp motståndarlaget är loppet slut, annars vinner bästa tid.
definition.zh-Hans: 两队选手在赛道对面直道的中间位置出发，努力缩短与对方间距的自行车追逐比赛

note.en-GB: Retired. Use Media Topic cycling + sports facets racetype + teamsize.
